name: Ivory Tower
description:
A simple arcade-action game designed to play retro. One button for action, and a joystick for movement.
Supports local multiplayer on one full sized keyboard, two controllers (Xinput recommended), or a combination of the two.
Purchase the soundtrack at Bandcamp.

PC build :

Should run on any modern Windows 10 PC with a graphics card.

Tested on Laptop (Windows 10) with an Intel Core i7-6700HQ 2.6GHz and NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960M.


Mac Build :

Tested on MacBookPro 2017, High Sierra version 10.13.3, 2.5GHz Intel Core i7, 16GB 2133 MHz LPDDR3, Intel Iris Plus Graphics 640 1536 MB
